SELECT a.id, a.company_name, a.company_position, b.name company_position_name, a.company_industry, c.name company_industry_name, a.salary, a.company_location, a.remark, a.state, a.create_time
FROM recruit a left join sys_common b on a.company_position = b.code and b.type='ZW' left join sys_common c on a.company_industry = c.code and c.type='HY' WHERE a.state = 'A' order by a.create_time desc
